text: Hafiz Rahim (19 November 1983 - 9 July 2020) was a Singaporean footballer. He played as a forward. From 2011 to 2020, he played for the national team. From 2006 to 2011, he played for the Geylang International. Rahim died on 9 July 2020 from a car crash in Singapore, aged 36.Former national footballer Hafiz Rahim, 36, dies after traffic accident ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Singaporean footballers
title: Hafiz Rahim
